title: Did a Buffalo Wild Wings Worker Turn Down the National Anthem Because It Is ‘Divisive’?
subtitle: The controversy was grounded in a real incident, for which the worker's employer apologized.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: On 11 September 2017, a worker at a Buffalo Wild Wings in Eastvale, California, turned down the volume on the national anthem before an NFL game, saying it was "divisive."
